mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rn, t.* from ( select * from content order by c_id desc) t) where rn between #{startNo} and #{endNo}
mapper.insert: insert into subscribe (SUB_ID, SUB_C_ID, T_M_ID, SUB_NAME, SUB_DATE, SUB_PRICE, SUB_ABLE, SUB_CURRENT) values (#{sub_id}, #{sub_c_id}, #{t_m_id}, #{sub_name}, #{sub_date}, #{sub_price} , #{sub_able}, #{sub_current})
